author: fmeschbe
msg: FELIX-1999 Handle ServletRequest.getPathInfo() possibly being null. For both filters and servlets, we assume the path info is "/" in case the actual path info is reported as null from the servlet container.

author: genspring
msg: The admin console is depending on dojo because of the new navigation tree.  --- the dojo dependencies should be added to console-tomcat/jetty instead of plugin-console-tomcat/jetty

author: kahatlen
msg: Added a visitEntries() method that could be used instead of
getTableForXA() to inspect the contents of the transaction table. Now,
the Hashtable is only visible to the TransactionTable class, which
will make it easier to replace it with another Map implementation
